files.name: .editorconfig
files.content:
[*]
indent_style = space
indent_size = 4
end_of_line = lf
charset = utf-8
trim_trailing_whitespace = true
insert_final_newline = true

files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
*~
*.lock
*.DS_Store
*.swp
*.out

npm-debug.log
.nyc_output/
coverage/
node_modules/

.vscode/
uncss.sublime-project
uncss.sublime-workspace

tests/screenshots

files.name: LICENSE.md

files.name: README.md
package-lock.json
package.json
files.content:
{
    "name": "uncss",
    "version": "0.17.3",
    "author": "Giakki",
    "description": "Remove unused CSS styles",
    "license": "MIT",
    "homepage": "https://github.com/uncss/uncss",
    "scripts": {
        "cover": "c8 npm run mocha",
        "eslint": "eslint \"**/*.js\"",
        "mocha": "mocha \"tests/*.js\"",
        "lint": "npm run eslint",
        "test": "npm run eslint && npm run mocha",
        "test:ci": "npm run eslint && npm run cover"
    },
    "main": "src/uncss.js",
    "bin": {
        "uncss": "bin/uncss.js"
    },
    "repository": {
        "type": "git",
        "url": "git+https://github.com/uncss/uncss.git"
    },
    "bugs": {
        "url": "https://github.com/uncss/uncss/issues"
    },
    "keywords": [
        "optimize",
        "optimise",
        "unused",
        "rules",
        "selector",
        "CSS",
        "HTML"
    ],
    "files": [
        "bin",
        "src"
    ],
    "dependencies": {
        "@root/request": "^1.9.2",
        "commander": "^4.1.1",
        "glob": "^7.2.3",
        "is-absolute-url": "^3.0.3",
        "is-html": "^2.0.0",
        "jsdom": "^17.0.0",
        "lodash": "^4.17.21",
        "postcss": "^8.4.22",
        "postcss-selector-parser": "^6.0.11"
    },
    "devDependencies": {
        "c8": "^7.13.0",
        "chai": "^4.3.7",
        "chai-resemble": "^2.0.0",
        "eslint": "^7.32.0",
        "eslint-config-problems": "^5.0.0",
        "husky": "^4.3.8",
        "lint-staged": "^12.5.0",
        "mocha": "^9.2.2",
        "prettier": "^2.8.7"
    },
    "engines": {
        "node": ">=12.0"
    }
}
